name: AVEQIA
short_description:
Our Packages
Introducing the perfect way to meet with your clients in a relaxed environment, socialize with your colleagues or simply enjoy good food and drink together with your peers.
Our chefs have years of experience working at top Michelin star restaurants across the world and they are as good with people as they are with food. When it comes to hosting team-working activities, the team at AVEQIA know exactly how to create the perfect experience for any occasion. An evening of Active Cooking at AVEQIA is much more than a cooking course or restaurant dining. Our Scandinavian inspired menus, combined with our state of the art Gaggenau and Siemens equipped  kitchens, create the perfect  mix of a luxury restaurant and an exclusive cooking studios.
 
We accommodate groups between 8 to 80 guests for Active Cooking experience as well as accommodating single bookings for selected dates. Our venue is also available for private hire for any occasion.
